trends: There have been 63 other sightings in Fresno
There were no other sightings in Fresno on or around May 5th 2006
Summary: spotted somes sort of aircraft with bright red and white ligthts flying at night
divs: sighting detailsi was sitting at home at 11:30pm when through the sliding glass window i spotted an aircraft flying not too distant across my field of view to the south, toward the west, at a normal aircraft cruising speed. oddities that make this more of a "ufo" than a normal aircraft sighting: 1) two red lights were visible, no green light, even after the aircraft moved further west so i could see its rear aspect 2) no noise, so not a helicopter. 3) red navigation lights were a bit brighter than normal 4) aircraft also had one or two bright white lights on aircraft moved behind some trees and i lost sight\interest. prolly a normal aircraft, but it was a bit odd for one.
